ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, that fight had too much moding in it to be acceptable. You can t just grab bots out of other bots hands. You can attempt to, but the other person has to

Ok, that fight had too much moding in it to be acceptable. You can't 
just grab bots out of other bots' hands. You can attempt to, but the 
other person has to post if the attempt was successful. You can't 
place a time bomb and have it explode in the same post, you have to 
let the other person reply. There were also some minor things about 
doing too many things in one post. Anyways, watch yourselves next 
time!


PS (to everyone). I wasn't on yesterday cause I was recabling my 
house / setting up a new server. Some of you might have noticed that 
the login script doesn't work right now. I'm still battling with the 
server to get that working. I wasn't on today cause I had work (yup, 
work on a saturday sucks), and then a few friends came over and we 
had an unplanned LAN party, which took up the rest of the time. I'm 
kinda pooped so I'll make a few quick posts and then go to sleep. 
I'll post in full tomorrow, though.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Luzbel/Attilla::
> 
> When Attilla saw what Galvatron had done, he cursed and quickly 
flew 
> a way his brother before the bomb exploted, Luzbel didn't let go of 
> Panzer and bomb damaged slighty his armor; after explotion, Luzbel 
> landed in order to check Panzer's status; Attilla landed too, and 
> walked some steps and stopped near his brother.
> 
> While Luzbel did that, Attilla was on guard and ready to fight; 
they 
> didn't like that Galvatron didnt strike back or any other group of 
> bots caught them unawared. 
> 
>
